LEFT JOIN t_tender_notes temp_tender_notes ON temp_receivables_notes.tender_notes_id = temp_tender_notes.tender_notes_id LEFT JOIN t_borrowing_loan temp_borrowing_loan ON temp_borrowing_loan.loan_id = temp_tender_notes.loan_id LEFT JOIN t_member temp_loan_member ON temp_borrowing_loan.member_id = temp_loan_member.member_id LEFT JOIN t_loan_tender temp_loan_tender ON temp_borrowing_loan.loan_tender_id = temp_loan_tender.loan_tender_id LEFT JOIN t_member temp_member ON temp_member.member_id = temp_receivables_notes.member_id LEFT JOIN t_user temp_creater ON temp_creater.user_id = temp_receivables_notes.creater LEFT JOIN t_user temp_updater ON temp_updater.user_id = temp_receivables_notes.updater
